tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS): A rarely used feature in Drupal core, via an underlying library, allows certain HTTP request attributes to be overridden. This can cause Drupal to cache responses it shouldnâ€™t (cache poisoning), resulting in broken rendering, unstyled or malformed pages, and degraded client-side functionality. The underlying library is being changed to mitigate the issue; Drupal core is hardened as an interim protection.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `drupal/core` library to the patch version.
